name: OJI
description:
For now the game is a very generic shoot 'em up, but i'll keep working and updating it as time goes on.

IMPORTANT :

I'm using Pyxel to develop the game, which is, and because it's a very new engine the packaging doesn't gives you a .exe file that you can simply download and run. You'll first have to install Pyxel. After what you can run the file called "oji.pyxres". HF !

Here is the link to the developer's GitHub page where you can find the details on how to install Pyxel :

https://github.com/kitao/pyxel
